attributes.action: Offer equal opportunity across the uk to all couples for ivf funding in the nhs
attributes.additional_details: Please see our appearance on bbc inside and out 08/02/2016 for our story
attributes.background: Infertility is a diagnosed & heartbreaking disease. Today access to fertility treatment is a post code lottery. Chelmsford is 1 of 3 out of 208 CCGs in the uk that offer no funding at all on the nhs. Yet in neighbouring towns couples can have up to three cycles. One cycle costing approx £6,500 😂
